mapper.insert: insert into tour(tid, title, districtcode, writer,nickname, contents, score, filename, rdate ) values((select nvl(max(tID),0)+1 from tour), #{title}, #{districtcode}, #{writer}, #{nickname}, #{contents}, #{score}, #{filename}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd'))
mapper.update: update tour set title = #{title}, districtcode= #{districtcode}, contents = #{contents}, score = #{score}, filename=#{filename}, rdate = sysdate where tid =#{tid}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tour
title like '%'||#{word}||'%'
writer like '%'||#{word}||'%'
and districtcode = #{districtcode}
